/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with modern buildings, their facades adorned with balconies and windows, reflecting the architectural style of the city. Trees and bushes add a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
